H0.text: On which part of the body would a mukluk be worn. Hand

H1.text: On which part of the body would a mukluk be worn. Head

H2.text: On which part of the body would a mukluk be worn. Neck

H3.text: On which part of the body would a mukluk be worn. Foot

A4.text: Mukluks are soft boots worn by Indigenous Arctic peoples

A5.text: Mukluks are worn without socks, because socks absorb and hold sweat
